CommonFields.Title: Dielectric properties of Poly(vinylidene fluoride)/CaCu3Ti4O12 composites
CommonFields.Author: Thomas, P.
Varughese, K.T.
Dwarakanath, K.
Varma, K.B.R.
CommonFields.Location: Dielectric Materials Division, Central Power Research Institute, Bangalore 560 080, India

Mixing.Description: The PVDF powder were melt-mixed in a Brabender plasticorder (Model: PLE 331) for 15 min at 175 deg C

XRay_Diffraction_and_Scattering.Description: Philips, Netherlands with Cu K alpha 1 radiation (lamda = 0.154056 nm) in a wide range of 2 theta (theta is between 5 degrees and 85 degrees.

Thermogravimetric_Analysis.Description: with alumina as the reference material

Electrometry.Description: The capacitance of the elctroded specimen was measured as a function of frequency (100Hz - 1 MHz) using an impedance gain phase analyzer at room temperature. A two terminal capcitor configuration was employed for this measurement.

data.description: frequency dependence of effective dielectric constant measured at 300 K.
frequency dependence of effective dielectric loss (D) measured at 300 K
thermal analysis for the pure PVDF
